title: CU Art Museum Membership / Salon II Fund
description: To support the CU Art Museum's Programs and Exhibitions, including entertainment, donor cultivation & recruitment.
marketingContent:
Join now!

Our members take pride in knowing that their membership helps to sustain a dynamic learning environment rich in artistic inquiry. Your financial support helps fund exhibitions, collections preservation and programming. 

To learn more about the benefits of our membership program, visit the CU Art Museum https://www.colorado.edu/cuartmuseum/join-give.

To join please choose the gift amount that corresponds with the member level at which you would like to join. To join at the Art Luminary levels, please enter “other amount” at the corresponding membership level.

ART LOVER MEMBERS

Friend Level $50 
$30 fair market value membership fee (2 members) 
$20 tax deductible value

Associate Level $100
$30 fair market value membership fee (2 members)
$70 tax deductible value
 
Sustainer Level $250
$30 fair market value membership fee (2 members)
$220 tax deductible value
 
Enthusiast Level $500
$30 fair market value membership fee (2 members)
$470 tax deductible value

ART LUMINARY MEMBERS

Investor $1,000
$190 fair market value membership fee (2 members)
$810 tax deductible value
 
Benefactor $2,500
$190 fair market value membership fee (2 members)
$2,310 tax deductible value
 
Visionary $5,000
$190 fair market value membership fee (2 members)
$4,810 tax deductible value
